name: jog
change_good_animal: You urge your steed into a trot.
change_good_mech: You set  your mech's leg servos to recirculation mode.
change_bad_none: You're too tired or injured to jog.
change_bad_animal: Your steed is too tired to go faster.
change_bad_mech: Your mech's leg servos are unable to operate faster.

name: timestop
change_good_none: You take several deep breaths and hold it. The light redshifts and everything stops.
change_good_animal: You envelop your steed in a chrono field. The light redshifts and everything stops.
change_good_mech: You open the shield and press the large red button. The light redshifts and everything stops.
change_bad_none: You try, but holding your breath is impossible right now.
change_bad_animal: Your chrono field flickers and fades from around your steed.
change_bad_mech: Your mech stumbles and comes to a halt, power exhausted.
